parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the policy. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description:
The ID of the policy that you want to modify.

> You can call the [DescribeSceneDefensePolicies](~~159382~~) operation to query the IDs of all policies.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the policy. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description:
The template of the policy. Valid values:

*   **promotion**: important activity
*   **bypass**: all traffic forwarded
